input.description:
String Value - The name of a configuration item defined in a configuration module.
Example: BMC_ARS_System, HP_ServiceCenter, ServiceNow
String Value - This contains the name or the id of the field you wish to search against.
String Value - This contains the value you are looking for in the key 1 field.

String Value - second key name or id
Note: ServiceCenter does not support for input values for key 2.

String Value - additional value
Note: ServiceCenter does not support for input values for value 2.

String Value - A query based upon the values and keys in the above fields.
Note: ServiceNow does not support for input values for query.
Flag which indicates whether configuration mappings are already extracted valid value="true","false"

output.description: An XML document providing the data template for single or multiple Concept elements.The incident concept is an XML document containing specific elements used to assign multiple values to a single context item. Each value is associated with an element of the Concept.
An XML document containing failed incidents
String Value - Count of incidents successfully created.
String Value - Count of incident creation failures
Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully. Valid values: success, failure.
A process specific string that explains the value of success status.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <fields> <xsl:apply-templates /> </fields> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="mappings/*"> <xsl:if test="string(@queryable) = '' or @queryable='true' "> <field> <xsl:value-of select="." /> </field> </xsl:if> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="query" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <schema>${schema name}</schema> <key>${key 1}</key> <value>${value 1}</value> <key2>${key 2}</key2> <value2>${value 2}</value2> <query> <xsl:value-of select="." /> </query> ${fields} </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="value" />
<xsl:template match="/"> <entries> <xsl:apply-templates/> </entries> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="entry"> <xsl:copy-of select="."/> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="metadata" />
</xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: Input to trasalate source to concept is ::
*** show incident input to translate enumerated values to field values *****

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${translated key 1}') = '0'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">incident-number</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${translated key 1}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" cdata-section-elements="query " /> <xsl:variable name="query-value">$[query]</xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <operation-name> <xsl:text>retrieve-incident</xsl:text> </operation-name> <model> <keys /> <instance> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length($query-value)!='0'"> <query>$[query]</query> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:element name="${translated key 1}"> <value>${value 1}</value> <type>${type value}</type> </xsl:element> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </instance> </model> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:xalan="http://xml.apache.org/xalan" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="query-mappings">${query mappings}</xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <hp-service-center-response> <xsl:copy-of select="node()/*" /> <mappings> <xsl:copy-of select="xalan:nodeset($query-mappings)/*/*" /> </mappings> </hp-service-center-response> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Incidents> <xsl:for-each select="//item/parameters/model/instance"> <Incident> <xsl:apply-templates select="." /> </Incident> </xsl:for-each> </Incidents> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="instance"> <xsl:for-each select="*"> <xsl:variable name="instance-element-child-name" select="local-name()" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="type/text()='Array'"> <xsl:element name="{local-name(//mappings/*[text()=$instance-element-child-name])}"> <xsl:for-each select="*[local-name()=$instance-element-child-name]/element"> <xsl:if test="position()>1"> <xsl:text> </xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" /> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:element> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:if test="string-length(local-name(//mappings/*[./text()=$instance-element-child-name]))>0"> <xsl:element name="{local-name(//mappings/*[./text()=$instance-element-child-name])}"> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:if> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: *** show incident input to translate enumerated values to field values *****

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <fields> <xsl:apply-templates /> </fields> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="mappings/*"> <xsl:if test="string(@queryable) = '' or @queryable='true' "> <field> <xsl:value-of select="." /> </field> </xsl:if> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="query" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${key 1}'!=''"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"><${key 1}>${value 1}</${key 1}></xsl:text> <xsl:if test="'${key 2}'!=''"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"><${key 2}>${value 2}</${key 2}></xsl:text> </xsl:if> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <all /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: *** show incident input to translate enumerated values to field values *****

documentation.description: This workflow will find an incident for a given set of variables.
